nodes.text: The Tomb of Miktrull was a Zeffo temple on Zeffo that served as the burial site of the Zeffo Sage Miktrull. Zeffo Tomb Guardians guarded the site, defending it against any intruders.In 14 BBY, former Jedi padawan Cal Kestis visits the tomb for a mission to rebuild the Jedi Order, and he notice images of Miktrull holding an astrium and Bogano’s vault.

The Tomb of Miktrull first appeared in the 2019 video game Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order, developed by Respawn Entertainment. During development, the tomb was made to communicate a shift toward power and decadence. Concept art for the tomb was done by Gabe Yeganyan.
